Uses of Interface
com.fasterxml.jackson.core.FormatSchema

Packages that use FormatSchema
com.fasterxml.jackson.core Main public API classes of the core streaming JSON processor: most importantly JsonFactory used for constructing JSON parser (JsonParser) and generator (JsonParser) instances. 
com.fasterxml.jackson.core.util Utility classes used by Jackson Core functionality. 
 

Uses of FormatSchema in com.fasterxml.jackson.core
 

Methods in com.fasterxml.jackson.core that return FormatSchema
 FormatSchema JsonParser.getSchema()
          Method for accessing Schema that this parser uses, if any.
 FormatSchema JsonGenerator.getSchema()
          Method for accessing Schema that this parser uses, if any.
 

Methods in com.fasterxml.jackson.core with parameters of type FormatSchema
 boolean JsonParser.canUseSchema(FormatSchema schema)
          Method that can be used to verify that given schema can be used with this parser (using JsonParser.setSchema(com.fasterxml.jackson.core.FormatSchema)).
 boolean JsonGenerator.canUseSchema(FormatSchema schema)
          Method that can be used to verify that given schema can be used with this generator (using JsonGenerator.setSchema(com.fasterxml.jackson.core.FormatSchema)).
 void JsonParser.setSchema(FormatSchema schema)
          Method to call to make this parser use specified schema.
 void JsonGenerator.setSchema(FormatSchema schema)
          Method to call to make this generator use specified schema.
